body.name: INOVADAY 100% Blackout Curtains for Bedroom 84 Inches Long, Clip Rings/Rod Pocket Linen Black Out Cute Curtains 2 Panels Set Thermal Insulated Curtains & Drapes for Living Room - Oatmeal W50 x L84
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Monday, February 19. Order within 26 mins
FREE delivery Monday, February 19. Order within 26 mins
features: 100% Total Blackout Curtains: Block out all distracting light from streaming into your home with a set of full blackout curtains from INOVADAY. Designed to keep your bedroom, living space or nursery dark, cosy and peaceful so you can sleep soundly until the morning

Easy To Hang With Two Fixture Types: Our room darkening curtains can be hung in two ways to suit any room style or fixture. Use the included 20 curtain ring clips to quickly hang them from your curtain pole, or hang them directly onto the pole with the built-in rod pocket.

Quickly Insulate Your Home Year Round: Each panel is fitted with temperature control lining to prevent the warmth from escaping the house during colder months, helping to reduce energy bills and keep your family cosy. During the summer, they can help reflect the heat from the sun, helping to keep your rooms cool and comfortable.

Beautiful Linen Style Texture: Effortlessly stylish, INOVADAY blackout drapes are crafted with a soft textured linen style material for a gorgeous look. Machine washable and wrinkle-resistant, these thick linen drapes are versatile, family-friendly and super sophisticated.
Blackout Curtain Panel Dimensions: Our oatmeal curtain set includes two individual panels each measuring 50 inches wide and 84 inches long. Curtain ring clips measure 1.2 inches in diameter.

How many pieces in a package？Is each panel 50 in width? There are 2 PANELS and 20 RING CLIPS in the package. Each panel mesures 50 in width. Do they truely block out light? Yes ! No doubt! They are thermal insulation and blackout. Is the length 84 inches with the clips hanging option? Or does that add an inch or 2? The hanging clips will add 2.2" more length. Are these curtains washable? Yes, they are machine washable in cold water, use only non-chlorine bleach when needed, no color fading, wrinkle resistant, warm ironing or steam clean if necessary.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 5, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great quality for great price!
reviews.reviewText: I recently purchased the INOVADAY 100% Black Out Curtains (96 inches long) in beige, and they have been a game-changer for my home. The curtains arrived neatly packaged, with clear care instructions, which I appreciated.* Quality & Material: The first thing I noticed was the quality of the material. The linen fabric feels durable yet has a soft touch, adding a hint of luxury to the overall look. The beige color is true to the images online, providing a warm, neutral tone that complements various decor styles, from boho to farmhouse.Blackout & Insulation: Living in a busy city, I needed curtains that could effectively block out the light. These curtains do just that. They provide complete blackout, perfect for late sleepers or those who require a dark room. Moreover, the thermal insulation is impressive.* Size & Fit: The dimensions (W50 x L96) are accurate, making them a perfect fit for my tall windows. They drape beautifully, giving a full, elegant look.* Ease of Use: Installing these curtains was straightforward. They slid easily onto my curtain rods, and the weight of the fabric ensures they hang neatly without any fuss.* Overall Look: The curtains have uplifted the aesthetic of my rooms. They add a sense of sophistication and coziness, transforming the spaces into more inviting areas.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I got these for my babies room and they are perfect. They are truly blackout curtains and come with provided clip on rings in case you don’t want to slip on to curtain rod. Thick material and nice color.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Much better than expected and have a nice muted beige color
reviews.reviewText: I wasn't sure what to expect from these... I have tried other blackout curtains from similarly priced comparable companies, and they always end up looking ridiculously cheap while also being great at blackout. I wanted sometime that looked great and worked well. One review complained they come "too wrinkled"... apparently, they have never experienced 100% real linen drapes out of the packaging because no amount of ironing will do it lol.. these came out with some wrinkles, but after a good ironing on the wool setting with steam they came out nearly wrinkle free, which I found shocking.. they are a nice muted beige.. they are not light gray as some have complained, but they are not a warm beige either.. for me its a perfect middle ground. For those wondering about the texture... they have a nice weight to them that real linen curtains do not have so they hang well for blackout especially... now to the feel of them.. ok they feel nothing like linen... you can tell they are a high quality polyester when you touch them... but how often are people running their hands over your curtains that aren't you... and who really cares... it doesn't feel bad... Even better they have no odor to them as many poly items often do... But the truly important part is how do they look visually... and this is where these really earn high marks... They look so good... I have them in a bedroom with walls slightly darker from the same color palette and it creates a wonderful peaceful environment in my bedroom... I would absolutely recommend these for the price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Love these drapes. Great light neutral color and totally blackout quality. I am a seamstress and the size is accurate, seams are straight and overall quality construction. Received and yes, there are wrinkles HOWEVER after reading previous posts I tossed each panel in the dryer on low/medium heat with a damp bath towel for 5-10 minutes. Pulled out of dryer immediately and hung on my windows. Look great! Would buy again!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars I do like
reviews.reviewText: I do really like these curtains. The blackout is true & the front show side in a nice linen type quality to it. Love the beige color. Quality control could be better. I have a 10ft window therefore I had to buy 2 for a total of 4 panels. Unfortunately none of these were the same, first ones were at least an inch shorter than the 2nd, the 3rd time I ordered the front was shorter than the back, the 4th there was a tear in the backing make light come through in just this one spot which was to me very noticeable. Finally the 5th order matched the 2nd length and I was able to send back the rest. Overall the end product was good but it was definitely a hassle to get there. If you window is smaller and you only need the 2 panels, or 1 order, you shouldn’t have any issues. There is also a lot of wrinkle right out of the package I put them in the dryer with a damp towel and ran the de-wrinkle cycle 2-3 time which helped. Also the longer they hang the better they look as far a wrinkles go. Hopes this helps!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars True Blackout curtains and amazing quality!
reviews.reviewText: This is the pottery barn dupe that I had been looking for. I did not want to spend hundreds of dollars per curtain panel at pottery barn for curtains just like these. These curtains are perfect in our bedroom and bought another set after we hung the first. No light comes through, they are soft and look very expensive. Love these curtains! Will buy more in future.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars High quality and beautiful!
reviews.reviewText: I have looked a long time for new drapes and these are so beautiful for the price. Nicely lined and a super thick blackout liner. Plus they come with rings!! Bought 3 more sets and did my living and bedroom in the beige! Love!!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect color, quality, & true blackout!
reviews.reviewText: These curtains are exactly what we were looking for for our bedroom slider door. The sun comes right in in the morning (so lovely, but some mornings we just aren't prepared to be blinded). My fiance wanted blackout curtains and these are TRUE blackout curtains! Like everyone else says, just throw them in the dryer on tumble with a dryer sheet to rid of the wrinkles & plastic packaging smell. We used the o-rings w/ the clips it came with to hang ours on a rod. I love this look, just may take a bit for you to find the perfect spacing between the rings when clasping the hooks on the curtain so it folds/waves real nice while hanging. The rings and the curtains are fantastic quality & there's no doubt they'll last a while. Also true to color when ordering off here! I imagine if we ever have to wash them they'll be a simple wash, too. I don't have anything bad to say they're just wonderful!
Really nice colour and quality, and true blackout. They aren’t pleated at the top so you’ll need rings to hang!
